CustomField.description: This field is just for tracking purpose and used in backend logic hence will be visible only to sys admin and not available on any page layout. This field value can either be true or false , value will be updated in updateopportunityPrimaryContact() method of OpportunityContactRoles class. This field value change (ISCHANGED(Is_Updated_From_Contact_Role__c)) is used to bypass VR's (CheckClinicalTypeIsNotBlank, CheckCloseDateNotInPast,CheckMarketSegmentIsNotBlank) which are getting logged as exception in exception logs.
CustomField.label: Is Updated From Contact Role
